name: Travels App
description: Using this application travels could find out the main information about the city, the current weather, events, and location to stop by.
technologies: Semantic-ui, Google maps API, OpenWeather API, Eventbrite API

name: React-Employee-Directory
description: Filters and Sorts JSON Data using React. Responsibilities included developing front end and creating logic for mapping and rendering JSON
technologies: React, Bootstrap, JSON, Node, Randomuser API

name: Hospitality
description: Hospitality is a healthcare portal for medical professionals to add, store and update patient records in a simple way. It is also tracks current treats such as the Corona virus.

name: Progressive Budget
description: The user will be able to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection. When entering transactions offline, they should populate the total when brought back online.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Dashboard utilizing Open Weather API to display information on One Day & Five Day forecasts as well as the UV Index.Responsibilities included developing a script for AJAX calls to OpenWeather APIs and dynamic HTML generation as well as front end developmen
technologies: JavaScript, Boostrap, OpenWeather API, AJAX and jQuery

name: Burger
description: A restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.
technologies: MySQL, Express, Handlebars, Node and a homemade ORM
